Reviews.Title: “Very nice and well-priced small hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mabroi
Reviews.Content: family five spent nights week reasonably priced hotel simply furnished comfortable views rooftops paris bathrooms excellent modern kept clean reception staff exception friendly helpful breakfast local cafes hotel provides reasonable buffet 8 euros pp stay negative comment carpets thorough clean

Reviews.Title: “A brilliant basic hotel in the heart of Paris!”
Reviews.Author: smileen141
Reviews.Content: partner nervous traveller quiet nights sleep relatively budget pick wisely night couldnt picked hotel manet clean quiet rue manet main streets ditalie service excellent balcony rooftops beautiful buildings ate meals found beautiful barrestaurant rue des magical time look forward returning sometime soon

Reviews.Title: “Just what we needed”
Reviews.Author: AndrewKiwi
Reviews.Content: looking stay paris daunting task look hotel websites hours wondering stay main paris expensive stay hotel location clean comfortable bed nice bathroom didnt feel claustrophobic friend recommended hotel manet exactly hoping huge means decent size especially paris bathroom clean free wifi internet windows fresh air cant remember seeing temperature control location hotel 23 minute walk metro station access 3 metro lines connected nearby restaurants handy didnt try continental breakfast glance bread spreads cook eggs tea coffee people low star rating star ratings mean absolutely paris looking stay thats pleasant spending fortune allows travel easily hotel manet ideal choice

Reviews.Title: “A great find”

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights children superfriendly staff nice clean paris ample breakfast including bread croissants yogurts cereal option boiled eggs nice residential neighborhood convenient multiple subway lines restaurants boulangeries etc mall department stores grocery store blocks definitely stay little bit subway ride touristy neighborhood feels real paris tourist theme park excellent value
